text:
Hello everyone!

I have some big news today!:tada:

It is an amazing feeling to finally share with the whole world the work that we've poured so much effort into! So, believe me when I say that, as a team, we are thrilled about the third Storyly launch on Product Hunt with Storyly Web Stories.

At Storyly, we have been providing mobile marketers and product managers with the ability to create and publish their own Stories in their own apps. We’ve been hearing from publishers how much they want to use stories on their websites, so we decided to go for it. Early adopters of the Web SDK have seen incredible improvements in their user engagement metrics, hence we couldn’t be more excited to share this new offering.

You can find us at <https://www.producthunt.com/posts/web-stories-by-storyly|Product Hunt>. Please get there to learn more about Web Stories. If you have any questions or feedback, let us know and leave a comment :raised_hands:

attachments.fallback: Product Hunt: Web Stories by Storyly - Engaging website experiences to boost ad revenue in 10 mins | Product Hunt
attachments.text: Start creating original and automated stories directly on your website to entice, educate, and inspire action. Storyly Web Stories is a lightweight page-speed friendly SDK that integrates in minutes.
attachments.title: Web Stories by Storyly - Engaging website experiences to boost ad revenue in 10 mins | Product Hunt

Hi everyone!

If you do not know who your Ideal Customer Profile is, you will most likely waste your budget and the time spent on your sales efforts. But, let's be honest, defying an ICP is easier said than done, therefore, here is a nifty article on How To Create an ICP For Lead Generation [4 Easy Steps + Free Template] :point_down:

text:
When marketing a product or service to a buying committee (usually composed of multiple stakeholders from different departments) we have to be very careful with our message. Each stakeholder in the buying committee has responsibilities and needs to fulfill within their own hierarchy, which means that they only have limited time to review information. Each individual will decide whether they are going to purchase your product based on what they see. Essentially, each stakeholder on the buying committee is responsible for their decision and must make sure it is going to help bring the company towards its goals.

<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/alaeddine-abid_b2b-b2bmarketing-contentmarketing-activity-6904425264378392576-GZ3b>

attachments.text: :bulb: Most B2B companies with a buying committee have a number of different stakeholders with different roles, needs, and are active on different channels...
attachments.title: Alaeddine ABID :rocket: on LinkedIn: #b2b #b2bmarketing #contentmarketing

Each stakeholder in the buying committee has responsibilities and needs to fulfill within their own hierarchy, which means that they only have limited time to review information. Each individual will decide whether they are going to purchase your product based on what they see. Essentially, each stakeholder on the buying committee is responsible for their decision and must make sure it is going to help bring the company towards its goals.

text:
*I'm super excited to announce the launch of our sister brand <http://Automatical.co|Automatical.co>* :mechanical_arm:

As many of you know we specialize in automation of business operations at <http://Lolly.co|Lolly.co> and we achieve this through a mix of process optimization workshops and custom development of tools/software/apps in order to accelerate your business. This is perfect for the type of company that wants to deep dive processes, cement new ones, and automate for the long term. Importantly the client owns the code & IP and can pass this onto their own development team to takeover longer term.

But.... many people don't want to own the code, they don't want to know how it's made, and they don't want to hire their own developers - they just want it to work, they want it done cost effectively, and they want it ~now~ yesterday.

So alongside our current brand we're launching a new service that can automate _any_ business process you can think of :rocket:
• Tasks automated in 25% of the time (and cost) it takes to typically create custom code
• A flat monthly fee starting at $2495
• Unlimited automation tasks!
*What type of stuff can we automate?*
• Want to snapshot a picture of a ton of competitor sites everyday and get alerted if something changes? You got it :thumbsup: 
• Want to enter a keyword to scrape all PPC advertisers to return their URLs and emails from <http://hunter.io|hunter.io> in a G sheet? No problem :thumbsup: 
• Want to add a hashtag for Twitter/Instagram and return a number of tweets between two dates. Job done :thumbsup: 
or if you're lazy like me....
• Want to have a RFID tage somewhere in your house that on a phone tap triggers Switchbots' to make the coffee, set the temperature in your office to a balmy 21c, boot your machine up, and turn the lights on? Easy :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing: 
*Use the code SPR20 for 20% off your lifetime subscription (limited to 10 - first come, first served)*

Sign up here :point_right: <http://automatical.co|automatical.co>

Would love to hear any feedback or answer any questions that you may have!

text:
I’d to share our speaker line-up and topics for our upcoming Office Hours event on March 16th:

<https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAACCy7hQB_iR1zo4aCS_853zRdokfZAUGhak|Michael Keenan>, Co-Founder, Peak Freelance
The Freelance Writing Trends of 2022 (And How To Act On Them)

<https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAACMDkAIBwEcFdV_qPYlSMQQrryiVXOm_wmw|Adrienne Barnes>, Founder, Best Buyer Persona
How To Create A Buyer Persona You’ll Actually Use 

<https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAALuADwBtVx1fHOqAR_Yed032sw7IpM8hEU|Emma Siemasko>, Founder, Stories By Us
How to Use Compelling Case Studies to Sell Your Stuff

Register for free. If you can’t make it we’ll send you key takeaways and the recording: <https://beomniscient.com/office-hours/>
